name: Don't Press this Button!
description:
This game was developed as a part of the "One Game A Week" Project Seminar at the University of Europe for Applied Science in Hamburg, short UE Hamburg. 

The topic of the Week was: "One Button"

Description:

There is a button.

You shouldn't press it. 

But are you going to listen to the title of a game?

Features:

It's as easy as pressing a button.

Nothing more.

Credits:

• Danarcade_exe

Background Music: CottageCore by Lindseysewel https://freesound.org/people/lindseysewell/sounds/512929/

SFX: https://freesound.org/people/pakasit21/sounds/138049/
